meanings: a village on the other side
a village at the opposite side

vlive.korean: '나 해남이야' 땅끝마을? "I am in Haenam." The end of the earth? 듣기 View video SF9 : 어머님들
vlive.english: "I am in Haenam." The end of the earth?

vlive.korean: 마룡 마을 출입 금지! Not allowed in Maryong Village! 듣기 View video IU : [IU TV] Blueming 꽃이 피었습니다.
[아름다운 마을 히트호른] 진짜? [Such a beautiful place] Really? 듣기 View video GOT7 : GOT7(갓세븐) TOURLOG EP.20
[벽화 마을로 뿅!] 하나, 둘, 셋! [Let's go to the Mural village] 1, 2, 3! 듣기 View video fromis_9 : [FM_1.24 Special] 프로미스나인 (fromis_9) - 프롬이의 걸어서 전주속으로 上편
이런 한옥마을도 가본 적 있죠? You've been to one of these villages before? 듣기 View video 컨버전스 TV (CONS TV) : [W메이트 5화]다시는 한국을 무시하지 마라
vlive.english: You've been to one of these villages before?

examples.korean: The village was razed to the ground. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 마을은 완전히 쑥대밭이 되어 버렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The village was razed to the ground. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Whole villages were stricken with the disease. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 모든 마을들이 그 질병에 걸려 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Whole villages were stricken with the disease. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Villages along the border are regularly raided. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 국경을 따라 나 있는 마을들은 정기적으로 급습을 당한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Villages along the border are regularly raided. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The village lies five miles due north of York. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 마을은 요크에서 정확히 북쪽으로 5 마일 거리에 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The village lies five miles due north of York. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The countryside was dotted with small villages. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 시골 지역에는 작은 마을들이 여기저기 흩어져 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The countryside was dotted with small villages. Add to Wordbook
